![Strazhnik] of the treasures: It is good. For this it is necessary to leave at the point of the rooms of the supervisors, who are located beyond the north, the south, the West and the east. Before each of these rooms you should select one of four books, which is the present part of the memoirs Of [kaeruna]. When you will obtain all parts of the memoirs, press, which guards them, it will be opened, and you will be able to take away the books. But you will memorize, that you will not be able to leave the room, until you pass testing.
